body_html:
I don't know if this is performant but this solution using slices has been working for me (tests included in gist).

https://gist.github.com/jperl/954631259eda0f81be750b67e25f9bc4

**edit: Seems like I have just reproduced a subset of tf.contrib.signal.frame 🤕
